book.synopsis: The Gulliver’s Travels of the nuclear age, the Alice in Wonderland of the arms race, this mordantly funny and visionary tale of the apocalypse was a Nebula finalist. The trouble starts when George Paxton ingenuously signs an admission of complicity in starting World War III. “The only book in the last ten years that I’ve read twice...a remarkable achievement” (Arthur C. Clarke).
book.title_long: This Is The Way The World Ends
book.dimensions: Height: 8.5 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 1 Pounds, Width: 0.84 Inches
